name: Class DefaultComboBoxModel<E>
text: The default model for combo boxes.
codes:
public class DefaultComboBoxModel<E>
extends AbstractListModel<E>
implements MutableComboBoxModel<E>, Serializable

methods.description: Set the value of the selected item. The selected item may be null.
Returns the index-position of the specified object in the list.

methods.method_sig: public void addAll (Collection<? extends E> c)
methods.description: Adds all of the elements present in the collection.

methods.method_sig:
public void addAll (int index,
                   Collection<? extends E> c)
methods.description:
Adds all of the elements present in the collection, starting
 from the specified index.
